testcase.name: Validate the url of Swiggy Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters url of Swiggy..............................................passed Then User should be navigated to Swiggy page................................passed

testcase.name: Check if the Delivery Location field is giving suggestions for valid city names
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters Valid "Pune" and get the list of suggestions...............passed Then User should be able to get suggestions for valid city names............passed

testcase.name: Check if the Delivery Location field is giving suggestions for valid city names 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters Valid "Bangalore" and get the list of suggestions..........passed Then User should be able to get suggestions for valid city names............passed

testcase.name: Check if the Delivery Location field is giving suggestions for Invalid city names
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters Invalid city names.........................................passed Then User should not be able to get suggestions for Invalid city names and error message should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to enter other location after clicking on Clear button
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters Valid city name and Click on Find Food button..............passed Then User should be able to view the Restaurants for the location...........passed

testcase.name: Check if clicking on Locate Me button fetch the current location.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User click on Locate Me button.........................................passed Then User should be able to get restaurants for current location............passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to change the location on Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Swiggy Page................................................passed When User enters Valid city name and Click on Find Food button..............passed And User clicks on Location dropdown and changes the location...............passed Then User is able to select location and view the Restaurants for the location.passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to get suggestions for Restaurant names in Search field
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User enters Restaurant name............................................passed Then User should get appropriate suggestions................................passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to get suggestion for Invalid restaurant and food item name
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User enters Invalid restaurant name....................................passed When User enters Invalid Food name..........................................passed Then No suggestions are displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to click on suggestions by Restaurant name
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User enters Valid restaurant name......................................passed And User is able to click on suggestions displayed..........................passed Then User should be redirected to appropriate Restaurant result page........passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to click on suggestions by Food Items
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User enters Valid food item name.......................................passed And User is able to click on suggestion displayed...........................passed Then User should be redirected to appropriate Food result page..............passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to click on Popular Cuisines and get suggestions
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User looks for Popular cuisines........................................passed And Clicks on desired popular cuisines suggestion...........................passed Then User should be able to view appropriate restaurants list for that cuisine.passed

testcase.name: Check if Restaurants and Dishes section are giving results
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User click on Valid food item..........................................passed And User is able to see options Restaurants and Dishes......................passed And User click on Restaurants and Dishes....................................passed Then User is able to click on them to fetch appropriate result..............passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to sort the search results by different methods
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Search Page................................................passed When User click on Valid food item..........................................passed And User is able to see options Restaurants and Dishes......................passed And User can sort by different methods......................................passed Then Appropriate search results should be displayed.........................passed

testcase.name: Check the behaviour of Cart button when no food item is added
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on Home page..........................................passed When User clicks on Cart button without adding any food item................passed And User gets redirected to secure checkout page............................passed Then User should get empty cart message.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check if User is able to view the list of all Recommended food items
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on Home page..........................................passed When User click on search field.............................................passed And User enters Valid Restaurant name and click on enter....................passed Then User should be able to view recommended food items list................passed
